typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Customers
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SalesPerson
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Territory
Customers keyGenerate(output(id_sk_customer as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyCustomers
SalesPerson keyGenerate(output(id_sk_salesperson as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeySalesPerson
Territory keyGenerate(output(id_sk_territory as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyTerritory
SurrogateKeyCustomers sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['customers'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> appcustomers
SurrogateKeySalesPerson sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['salesperson'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> appsalesperson
SurrogateKeyTerritory sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['territory'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> appTerritory
